ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Filtering what is indexed based on URL's...

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset=US-ASCII;
	format=flowed;
	delsp=yes
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

When I paste in this string:

^http://www.mysite.com/show/artist.*$

as the regex, it seems to prevent my initial seed page of
http://www.mysite.com/browseartists.html from being crawled...

Is there a simpler approach, like "any url that matches this Glob  
pattern?" and provide a couple of globs patterns to use?

Eric


On Apr 29, 2009, at 2:43 PM, Ko, Lauren wrote:

>
>
> Hi Eric,
> You might want to read here: http://crawler.archive.org/articles/user_manual/glossary.html#surtprefix 
> . If you are using the SurtPrefixedDecideRule, to get to the SURT  
> prefix when there are 3 or more slashes in the URL, everything after  
> the last slash is truncated. You could try using a  
> MatchesRegExpDecideRule instead to match the pattern ^http://www.mysite.com/show/artist.*$ 
>  instead.
>
> Lauren Ko
> Web Archiving Programmer
> Digital Projects Unit
> University of North Texas
> ________________________________________
> From: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com [archive- 
> crawler@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Eric Pugh [epugh@... 
> ]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 29, 2009 8:56 AM
> To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [archive-crawler] Filtering what is indexed based on URL's...
>
> I am searching a site and I want to limit it to just a subset of urls
> that match the pattern /show/artist. Right now it crawls anything.
>
> I thought SURT logic would do it, but it doesn't seem to parse below
> the www.mysite.com level of a URL... Or am I understanding SURT
> wrong? My SURT patterns were just done by pasting in a full URL and
> seeing what came out.
>
> Also, how would I filter archiving of images, css, etc.. I only want
> HTML pages.
>
> I am using Heretrix 2.0 (and quite liking it!)
>
> Eric
>
> -----------------------------------------------------
> Eric Pugh | Principal | OpenSource Connections, LLC | 434.466.1467 |http://www.opensourceconnections.com
> Free/Busy: http://tinyurl.com/eric-cal
>
>
> 

-----------------------------------------------------
Eric Pugh | Principal | OpenSource Connections, LLC | 434.466.1467 | http://www.opensourceconnections.com
Free/Busy: http://tinyurl.com/eric-cal





--Apple-Mail-436-803622202
